update jk_loan_limit set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loan_apply_id = #{loanApplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loan_receipt_id = #{loanReceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card_id = #{bankCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_amount = #{useAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cut_charge = #{cutCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repay_type = #{repayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term_unit = #{termUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expect_repay_amount = #{expectRepayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repay_periods = #{repayPeriods,jdbcType=TINYINT}, interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tenant = #{tenant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_contract_id = #{publishContractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_contract_publish = #{isContractPublish,jdbcType=TINYINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, loan_use_type = #{loanUseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from jk_loan_limit
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT product.`name` AS productName,loanLimit.id AS loanLimitId,loanLimit.use_amount AS useAmount,loanLimit.term AS term,loanLimit.term_unit AS termUnit,DATE_FORMAT(loanLimit.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d') AS applyDate,DATE_FORMAT(loanLimit.modify_time,'%Y/%m/%d') AS finishedDate,loanLimit.`status` AS `status` FROM jk_loan_limit loanLimit LEFT JOIN jk_loan_product product ON loanLimit.product_id=product.id LEFT JOIN jk_loan_apply apply ON loanLimit.loan_apply_id=apply.id WHERE loanLimit.`status`!=4 AND loanLimit.uid=${uid} ORDER BY loanLimit.create_time

SELECT product.`name` AS productName,loanLimit.id AS loanLimitId,loanLimit.use_amount AS useAmount,loanLimit.term AS term,loanLimit.term_unit AS termUnit,DATE_FORMAT(loanLimit.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d') AS applyDate,DATE_FORMAT(loanLimit.modify_time,'%Y/%m/%d') AS finishedDate,loanLimit.`status` AS `status`,general.this_period_amount AS repayAmount FROM jk_loan_limit loanLimit LEFT JOIN jk_loan_product product ON loanLimit.product_id=product.id LEFT JOIN jk_loan_apply apply ON loanLimit.loan_apply_id=apply.id LEFT JOIN jk_loan_repay_general general ON general.loan_limit_id=loanLimit.id WHERE loanLimit.`status`=4 AND loanLimit.uid=${uid} ORDER BY loanLimit.create_time
